document_data.name: Helharbras
document_data.occupation: [[War Wizard]]It is possible that Helharbras was just a guard, but it is unlikely, as Ganrahast knows him and three others by name. He is at least personally known to the Royal Magician, and appears to be under his direct control.
document_data.mainbody: '''Helharbras''' was a [[War Wizard]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: His name was directly known to [[Ganrahast]].
document_data.History: In [[Mirtul]] of {{yearlink|1479}}, [[Ganrahast]] assigned four War Wizards to prevent access to anyone seeking entrance to the [[Chamber of Wyms Ascending]] in [[Castle Obarskyr]], in the aftermath of the discovery of the bodies of the guards killed by [[Marlin Stormserpent]] and his forces during their search for the [[Wyverntongue Chalice]]. These wizards were [[Tomarr]], Helharbras, [[Baerendrith]] and [[Nelezmur]].
